C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The door in King Din's castle led to a strange space. You don't know where you are, but it's clear the path you must follow lies beyond.

C01_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The Emerald Wave points in the direction of several doors—which one you use is up to you.

C01_WRLD_COMM_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_COMM_EINHERJAR_BRAVE_000_DETAIL.text: Hero was no hero after all. When one attempts to transcend themselves, it gives birth to darkness.

C01_WRLD_COMM_ICECASTLE_NEGATIVE_110_DET.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_COMM_ICECASTLE_NEGATIVE_110_DET.text: You fought the final emperor to protect Alexandre, but were cast out of Grelon as a result. However, you were able to draw the darkness out of General.

C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_600_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_600_DETAIL.text: You now have the Generals at your beck and call—and they are a powerful asset indeed! The time has come for you to recover your throne.

C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_610_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_SIUG_EINHERJAR_610_DETAIL.text: You now have the Generals at your beck and call—and they are a powerful asset indeed!  With their help, you could surely recover your throne...but is it worth being so fixated on power?

C01_DOOR_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: The armored man is doubtless waiting for you in the Dark Castle.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: Your chance to once more rule as the Dismal King awaits on the other side of this door.

C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_EVNT_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: The armored man who infiltrated the Dark Castle awaits you here—but what is his ultimate goal?

C01_DOOR_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_LASTBATTLE_100_DETAIL.text: A new door has been revealed, one that leads to the climax of your tale.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W01_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W01_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W01_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to Lifetaker's darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W02_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W02_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W02_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to bright light and deep darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W04_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W04_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W04_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to Hero's darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W06_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W06_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W06_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to a world on the verge of being consumed by darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W07_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W07_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W07_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to a world that is about to lose harmony and fall to darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W08_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W08_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W08_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W08_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to darkness alone.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W09_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W09_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W09_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W09_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to Champion's darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W10_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W10_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W10_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W10_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to Philosopher's darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W11_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W11_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W11_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W11_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to a darkness produced by living beings.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W12_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W12_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W12_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W12_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to General's darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W13_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W13_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W13_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W13_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to Warrior's darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W14_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W14_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W14_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W14_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to a world where everything is clear—and yet, that leads only to darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W15_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W15_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W15_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W15_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to a darkness produced by endless desire.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W18_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W18_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W18_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W18_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to a conflict producing darkness.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W19_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W19_000_TITLE.text: The Door to a New World

C01_DOOR_SIUG_W19_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_W19_000_DETAIL.text: You sense no darkness on the other side of this door.

C01_DOOR_SIUG_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_SIUG_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.text: A truly grueling battle awaits beyond this door.
